description:
Stay connected on the go with the XFINITY Connect mobile app. Check your Comcast.net email, send and receive text messages, make and receive Voice calls and check your XFINITY voicemail all in one place. Answer your home phone calls and forward calls from your home phone to your iPhone. 

FEATURES 

NEW! 
- A refreshing new design and experience
- Voice 2go* - Now make unlimited voice calls from XFINITY Connect app using your XFINITY Voice numbers. 
- Never miss a phone call : Answer all your home phone calls from XFINITY Connect App. 
- Send and receive free unlimited text messages to the U.S., Canada, Mexico and over 40 other countries using your home phone number – no texting plan required! Even text from your iPad® or iPod touch® 
* Included for XFINITY VOICE Residential Unlimited customers. Terms & conditions apply. 

Messages 
-Easy access to email and voicemail 
-Mark emails as ‘Spam’ and sort and search your email 
-Print emails right from your app
-Mark messages as ‘Read/Unread’ and ‘Heard/Unheard’ 
-Access your external email accounts all in one place – Gmail, Yahoo, etc 

XFINITY Voice 
- Answer your XFINITY Voice calls from the app. Make outgoing calls using your XFINITY Voice number. 
- Text for FREE using your XFINITY Voice number 
-See who's calling your home phone with real-time alerts to your iPhone 
-Listen to voicemail or read voicemail transcripts of your voicemails and view your home phone call logs 
-Forward a voicemail as an email attachment 
-Forward your home phone calls to your iPhone or any other number 

Favorites and Groups 
- Create Favorites and Groups to make sure you never miss a message from the important people in your life 

Address Book 
- Includes separate views of your phone contacts and your XFINITY Address Book 
-Add your contacts as favorites along with their pictures 

My Account 
-View your account details & billing history 
-Make payments or setup automatic payments. 

REQUIREMENTS 
- XFINITY Internet or XFINITY Voice subscription 
- Comcast ID or Comcast.net email address (Need your Comcast ID? go to http://customer.comcast.com/help-and-support/account/) 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Restrictions apply. Not available in all areas. Free texting requires subscription to XFINITY Voice Unlimited service. Standard data charges apply. Check with your carrier. 

Discussion forum - please visit -http://forums.comcast.net
